member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.#ctor(Lease.API.Data.Repository.ILeaseAgreementRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LeaseAgreementsController class
member.param: An instance of ILeaseAgreementRepository to handle the System Users
An instance of IMapper to map between System User entities and models

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.GetLeaseAgreements
member.summary: Returns a list of System Users
member.returns: A list of System User models, or No Content if no System User found

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.GetLeaseAgreement(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a specific System User based on the username
member.returns: The System User model, or Not Found if the System User is not found

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.PutLeaseAgreement(System.Guid,Lease.API.Models.LeaseAgreementUpdateModel)
member.summary: Updates a specific System User based on the username
member.param: The username of the System User to update
member.returns: No Content if the System User is updated successfully, or Bad Request if the System User or the update information is invalid

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.PostLeaseAgreement(Lease.API.Models.LeaseAgreementRequestModel)
member.returns: The created System User model, with a location header pointing to the URL of the newly created System User

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.LeaseAgreementsController.DeleteLeaseAgreement(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a specific System User based on the username
member.param: The username of the System User to delete
member.returns: No Content if the System User is deleted successfully, or Not Found if the System User is not found
